summary: This document is an email chain from November 2016 regarding a DVR upgrade quote, sent by Steve Smith of SigNet Technologies to an unidentified recipient. It appears to be routine business correspondence related to security system equipment.

persons.name: Steve Smith
persons.role: Federal Sales Representative at SigNet Technologies
persons.context: The sender of the email chain, discussing a DVR upgrade quote with an unidentified recipient.

events.title: Initial DVR Upgrade Inquiry
events.description: Steve Smith sends an initial email to an unidentified recipient stating he is working on a quote for a DVR upgrade and asking if they have time to discuss.

events.title: Follow-up on DVR Upgrade Quote
events.description: Steve Smith sends a follow-up email regarding the DVR upgrade, asking if the recipient wants a complete swap-out of equipment or to reuse some newer components like the AMS and decoder.

locations: 12300 Kiln Ct Suite E, Beltsville MD 20705 (SigNet Technologies office)
keyFacts: The document is a business email about a DVR upgrade quote from SigNet Technologies.
The primary correspondent is Steve Smith, a Federal Sales Representative.
The recipient of the email is not named in the provided text.
The email discusses reusing some newer components (AMS and decoder) versus a complete equipment swap-out.
The correspondence dates from late November 2016.
